venue.name: Sheraton Colonial Boston North Hotel & Conference Center

item.description:
Friends of Wakefield Baseball Fundraiser! 6-9 pm. $30 each or 2 for $50!! At the Sheraton Colonial Boston North in Wakefield.

Local restaurants, bakeries and caterers will provide plenty of food and there will also be a silent auction and raffle. Let's support our local sports programs! I will post the official flyer soon. I've heard from a few people who attended last year and they said it was worth the $/donation!


You can buy tickets at the door!
item.name: Taste of Wakefield Fundraising event - FOOD, prizes and fun!
